titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties letter to the Queen; concerning the differences betwixt the English and the Scots, and the great distractions within the city of London; together with His Majesties promise to his consort the Queene. Wherein is discovered the late proceedings of the King, touching the French Army, and their designe. With certain proposals to the kingdome of England. Perused and examined by a perfect copy, and published for generall satisfaction of all His Majesties subjects.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties letter to the Queen; concerning the differences betwixt the English and the Scots, and the great distractions within the city of London; together with His Majesties promise to his consort the Queene. Wherein is discovered the late proceedings of the King, touching the French Army, and their designe. With certain proposals to the kingdome of England. Perused and examined by a perfect copy, and published for generall satisfaction of all His Majesties subjects.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Oreton, and are to be sold neere the Royall Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 2d"; the 8 in imprint date is crossed out and replaced with a "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
